column4: is there a reverse of "backport" like "forwardport" where you build an older version of a package (f/e libusb-0.1-4 -12 one for intrepid) w/ jaunty, which has -13 ?
backport means that packages from +1 are included, right?
right, I am looking for packages from -1
Couldn't help you; I never knew, though.
